description:
This course is for you if you need to understand working capital. A key area in any business is effective working capital management.

Many business managers and owners of small business are dismayed when they learn how much money they are wasting in this crucial area.

The course looks at the working capital definition. It looks at changes in net working capital and how these can be evaluated.

If you want to learn how to improve working capital performance, and learn easily with key financial ratios than can help you monitor this area, this course is for you.

The course is set out so that it is suitable for all levels

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are a growing number of students taking our classroom teachings who see this as the most important part of their course.

The reason is because so much money can be lost if this area is not managed well. That is why effective working capital is the cornerstone of many successful businesses.

Though simply getting to grips with what it is first is the key consideration. The course does this and starts off with the definitions and theory.

It then moves in to applying this theory to a step by step worked case study example.

By the end of the course students will :

  • know how to improve working capital and money flow
  • be able to improve a business profitability
  • spot key ways to improve working capital performance
  • very quickly calculate working capital
  • apply simple ratios to enhance business performance
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
